title: Explained: Why Amit Shah’s Chandigarh move has made Punjab political parties see red - The Indian Express
content:
1. Explained: Why Amit Shah’s Chandigarh move has made Punjab political parties see red  The Indian Express
  2. Why BJP & AAP are locking horns again, this time over change in Chandigarh admin service rules  ThePrint
  3. Explainer: Why Union Govt's Decision to Bring Central Service Rules to Chandigarh Has Raised Furore  The Wire
  4. AAP, Congress, SAD speak in one voice: Shah move way to usurp Punjab’s rights over Chandigarh  The Indian Express
  5. Chandigarh | Policy decisions pending with home ministry set to be fast-tracked  Hindustan Times
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Punjab Chief Minister Bhagwant Mann has threatened protests against Union Home Minister Amit Shah's announcement that March 28 onwards, Central service rules will apply to employees of the Union Territory of Chandigarh. A look at the announcement, and the politics
